name: GetMeAnimeFact
0:
”Alexa open get anime fact”
”Alexa begin get anime fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: get anime fact
des:
Get Me Anime Fact skill for Amazon Alexa. This skill brings you random anime facts that are nice to know.
Standard commands
 "Alexa open get anime fact" to launch the skill
"Alexa tell me a fact" in order to get the random fact.
"a fact", in order to get the random fact.
"tell me a fact", in order to get the random fact.
"give me a fact", in order to get the random fact.
"tell me trivia", in order to get the random fact.
"give me trivia", in order to get the random fact.
"give me some information", in order to get the random fact.
"tell me something", in order to get the random fact.
"give me something", in order to get the random fact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
